desc:
70% all parameters, probable damage reduction to 1, probable spark critical & fills BB gauge each turn
Guild Raid: 0-150% Atk, Def relative to remaining HP & add to SBB (Boosts spark damage (All elements) for 3 turns)
lore: A brilliant medal ensconced in a spectrum of colors. As befits its title, this medal is the crowning achievement bestowed upon those who master all the disciplinesâ€”including those of the heart. Only the greatest of champions can invoke its tremendous powers and reach even higher heights.
name: Prism Crown
